pre_caption_prompt:

pre_caption: The video shows two individuals in a room with a spiral staircase. One person is standing on the upper level of the staircase, leaning against the railing and looking down. The other person is sitting on the lower level of the staircase, facing away from the camera. There is no significant action or movement observed in the frames provided.
